item.title: Cloud Foundry configuration with SteelToe
item.author: sharrewijnen@live.com (Sander Harrewijnen)
item.description:

While playing around with it the configuration part of it I wasn’t really liking the way settings can be read from the main configuration.

Let’s start with a really short primer on how the configuration system works.
